Address: 2002 PAPA JOHNS BOULEVARD, LOUISVILLE, Kentucky, 40299-2334, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Papa John's International, Inc., a Delaware corporation (referred to as the "Company", "Papa John's" or in the first person notations of "we", "us" and "our"), operates and franchises pizza delivery and carryout restaurants and, in certain international markets, dine-in and delivery restaurants under the trademark "Papa John's". Papa John's began operations in 1984. At December 29, 2019, there were 5,395 Papa John's restaurants in operation, consisting of 598 Company-owned and 4,797 franchised restaurants operating in 49 countries and territories. Our Company-owned restaurants include 192 restaurants operated under four joint venture arrangements. Papa John's has defined four reportable segments: domestic Company-owned restaurants, North America commissaries (Quality Control Centers), North America franchising and international operations. North America is defined as the United States and Canada. Domestic is defined as the contiguous United States.  ... More ...
